newsitem.title: USA: Lucent sues Aspect over four patents.
newsitem.headline: Lucent sues Aspect over four patents.

text.p: Lucent Technologies Inc said Thursday it has filed a patent infringement lawsuit against Aspect Telecommunications Corp in a federal district court in Allentown, Pa.
In the lawsuit, Lucent said it accuses the San Jose, Calif.,-based company of infringing four specific patents in the Aspect CallCenter system, an automatic call distribution (ACD) product.
It said the patents relate to microprocessor-directed call routing, tele-agent management and identification, and computer telephony integration.
"This filing is part of our ongoing effort to protect our intellectual property rights," said Richard J. Rawson, senior vice president and general counsel of Lucent Technologies.
No official of Aspect was immediately available to comment.
